RuleSet.Name: src/schema/jpa/SchemaJpaTableHPKey.java
RuleSet.Descr: Java JPA implementation of a $TableName$ history primary key object.

GenFile.Name: fileSchemaJpaTableHPKeyJava
GenFile.BasePackageName: $reference ManufacturingSchema lower JavaPackage$.$reference ManufacturingSchema lower SchemaName$jpa/src/main/java
GenFile.SubPackageName: $reference ManufacturingSchema lower JavaPackage$.$reference ManufacturingSchema lower SchemaName$.jpa

RuleSet.GenRule: extends $DefSchemaName$Jpa$TableName$HPKey
implements I$DefSchemaName$$TableName$HPKey, Comparable<Object>, Serializable
, I$reference BaseClass SchemaName$$reference BaseClass TableName$HPKey, I$SchemaName$$TableName$H
